so we've been on Amazon Web Services

unstable right so you have China that

most amazing advantage because if you

Americans go into bed the Chinese are

infrastructure support right and you
don't have any excuses for things that
not work in real time for that for us
now we have everything in real time we
we sometimes are just a few milliseconds

for us as we have a reputation of good
